name: getLinodeTransferByYearMonth
description: Returns a Linode's network transfer statistics for a specific month. The year/month values must be either a date in the past, or the current month.

linodeId.description: ID of the Linode to look up.

year.description: Numeric value representing the year to look up.

month.description: Numeric value representing the month to look up.

$ul: **bytes_in**: The amount of inbound public network traffic received by this Linode, in bytes, for a specific year/month.
**bytes_out**: The amount of outbound public network traffic sent by this Linode, in bytes, for a specific year/month.
**bytes_total**: The total amount of public network traffic sent and received by this Linode, in bytes, for a specific year/month.
